full_description:
GIGABYTE AORUS AGC310 Gaming Chair

GIGABYTE AORUS AGC310 Gaming Chair is an ergonomically designed Gaming Chair that is very efficient and comfortable. It features All-Steel Frame & Base, 2D Adjustable Armrest, 160Âº Max Tilting Angle, and a CLASS 4 Certified Gas Lift. Everything a gamer can ask for. It is made from high-quality leather and velvet fabric, which brings out the art of mix and match. The streamlined design and the style of mix and match make the entire gaming chair understated without losing luxury. This gaming chair has a wide backrest that keeps your neck and spine from getting hurt or get tired. This chair is very flexible, it can be adjusted to your desired position very easily. Enjoy every gaming moment in comfort with the adjustable and step-less backrest from 90 to 160 degrees. AORUS AGC310 gaming chair fits all sizes of gamers, has a larger seat and a wider back, which can fit various figures. The streamlined design from the racing concept brings more body-hugging fit, lets you immerse all of yourself into the game. The headrest cushion and the adjustable lumbar support cushion are suitable for gamers of different body shapes. The adjustable 2D armrests allow you to place your elbows in the most comfortable position, so you can rest your forearms and game stress-free by relieving strains on your shoulders and wrists. The seat is equipped with high-density foam, which has better resilience and weight-bearing features. With the vents on the seat surface design, gamers can experience comfortably those long-time gaming. International CLASS 4 certification gas lift is responsible for adjusting the seat height, and bring a more stable and safe experience. It has no warranty.

values.value: Wear green PU skin, High-density flexible foam, Steel internal architecture, PP soft armrest, Steel feet
